description:
The Rotational Stools are a complementary pair that share common proportions
(15" tall x 9.5" square) and variations on a rotational structure. They
function equally well as low stools or as side tables - individually, in
pairs, or in aggregate.

A pair of Rotational Stools requires one fourth of a 4'x8' sheet of plywood.
You can make 8 stools from a single sheet of plywood, or nest parts into unused
areas of plywood, as you're cutting other projects.
name: Rotational Stools
